ygData.subject: Postponed Wrath of the Alliance
ygData.msgSnippet: (Yanshosh will keep control of Firestarter and Unitron after this post I have to do.  He still has control of Imprisoner, Predator, and Choran.  He has a plot

Subject: Postponed Wrath of the Alliance

(Yanshosh will keep control of Firestarter and Unitron after this post I have 
to do.  He still has control of Imprisoner, Predator, and Choran.  He has a 
plot with those five characters and I don't want to mess it up.  I'll be 
repossessing the rest of my characters

Firefox, what is the current condition of the hole made by Oblitertron in the 
bridge?  Are the shields around it, was it sealed by more plating?  I may not 
have got some from eGroups.)


The Oblitercons/The Protectobots/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw/
Sixshot/Ares/Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Bumblebee/Minion/Chaos/Sun 
Crusher/Reflector/Scattershot/Nemesis Enforcer/Vehement/Firestarter/Unitron/
Smokescreen:



Dark One hovered down next to FZ.  "Oblitercons, hold your fire.  They're 
trying to negotiate again, I think.  Be prepared to zero in on a single 
Maximal at a time to take them down quicker." he said in a comm. transmission 
to his four warriors.

---

Breakdown readied his grenade launcher and sonic blaster, walking back over 
to FZ after receiving Dark One's message.

---

Pyro shook for a cycle, trying to get the blasted mud off him.  It didn't 
help.  He received Dark One's message, but a big glob of mud just ran down 
into his optics and he was furiously trying to wipe it away.

---

Hiss shook his hand, not able to get any mud off of it.  He looked to Pyro, 
and received Dark One's message.

"Understood." he replied.  "I'll stay with Pyro and give him cover fire, he's 
still out of it."

---

Scavenger raised his chain gun, stepping near the Maximals.  "And you call us 
treacherous." he said to Iron Raptor.  "Your subordinates attacked us and 
then you order all out fighting upon us."

---

Hot Spot watched Iron Raptor and HER Maximals.  He was not seeing signs of a 
competent leader.

"Blades, can you fly?"

---

Groove looked to Hot Spot, wondering what in the Pit he was thinking.  He 
kept his weapon trained on Hiss, ready to fire vapor at him.

---

Blades nodded to Hot Spot, knowing what he wanted.  "I can.  What do you want 
me to do with First Aid?"

"Fly him to a safe distance, do the best repairs you can do on him, and guard 
him.  But be ready to fly here like a petro bat out of the Pit if the battle 
ends and a CR chamber is open." Hot Spot replied.  "Now hurry up, make like 
Blurr and get out of here."

"Yes, sir." Blades grinned, pain filling into his wounds as he moved, getting 
over First Aid.  He transformed, First Aid now sitting in the pilot's seat 
and strapped in, though still in stasis lock.

Blades' rotor blades powered up slowly, taking several more cycles than usual 
to gain the correct speed, the AH-64 Apache attack helicopter moving upwards 
and heading to the northwest at 80 MPH, the maximum speed he could reach in 
his badly damaged condition.

---

Streetwise watched his two fellow Protectobots go into the air and head 
towards the north.  He looked to Hot Spot and Groove, waiting for orders as 
he kept his charged photon pistol at the ready.

===

Demon Wulf turned towards Iron Raptor as she gave the order for her warriors 
to attack, but stopped as he heard FZ's orders.  War, peace, war, peace.  
This wasn't getting anywhere.  -No wonder the Vok want these Cybertronians 
dead- he thought.

---

Flesh Ripper transformed to hyena mode as he heard FZ's orders, ready to 
pounce and rip the throat out of the nearest Maximal at the first sign of 
trouble

---

Dark Claw was ready to charge blue orbs, but heard FZ's orders.  "Blasted..." 
he powered the orbs down, extending his claws and getting in a position to 
leap at Iron Raptor.

---

Sixshot and Ares looked to each other, both mumbling something about the 
Maximals being idiots.

---

Double Punch's internal systems told him internal repairs on his stealth mode 
were 63%.  Maybe if these negotiations kept getting held up, he could cloak 
and do some damage.

---

Manterror hovered in the air, pointing his claws down at Kluster, ready to 
fire them if fighting broke out.

---

Injector landed next to Double Punch, his pistol lowered, but his optics 
charging full of deadly laser energy.

---

The damage Bumblebee hovered in the air, pain searing through his entire 
body, his launchers feeling like weights that were a ton.

---

Minion sighed, wondering what the slag was the hold up.  He wanted to kill 
some people or go home.  But no, it's attack, hold your fire, attack, hold 
your fire.  Someone better make a slaggin' decision or he was just going to 
open fire into a crowd of Maxis while they weren't expecting it.

---

Chaos transformed to his missile truck mode, arming two five foot long 
missiles.  He'd be at the ready to fire them into the Maximals if things 
didn't start progressing.  He wasn't a peaceful bot, and his nature wasn't 
going to change now.


---

Nemeiss Enforcer hovered painfully, keeping his rifle trained on Iron 
Raptor's head.  "Come on..." he whispered to himself with a smile.  "Just 
attack."

---

Scattershot laughed at Nemesis burnt wings, sighing and raising a charge he 
held in his hands, hovering above the Maximals.  He set it to explode on 
impact and was prepared to drop it.  "Destroy Iron Raptor, kill the grand 
poo-bah, eliminate even the toughest stains." he said to himself, breaking 
out in hysterical laughter.

===

Sun Crusher hovered near CF, his rifle at the ready.  He awaited an order 
from his Archbishop.  "What is the situation with the Alliance and the other 
heathens?"

---

"All the Maximals were about to attack the Alliance while only several 
Alliance members returned fire against a group of Maximals.   They all seemed 
to be confused."

"Good." Sun Crusher replied.  "If we get the Key we can get out of here and 
bring back the Divine One."

===

Unitron kept up his pace, looking to Firestarter.  "My horn missiles are 
almost ready to go off.  Even from a distance I can set them off."

"Excellent, Unitron.  My sensors don't detect any Maximals near us."

Unitron relayed commands to his horn missiles embedded in the center of the 
main entry way's lockdowned doors, still emitting sonic waves to weaking the 
doors at the molecular level.

===

Vehement watched Unitron and Firestarter leave but waited.  He waited for 
several cycles at the most, the cannons at the ends of his arms taking the 
form of large black arms with fists instead of weapons.

"Come on out, Warrior of Light.  Your time is close to nil."

Smokescreen came out of the shadows into the bridge, raising his sword and 
getting into a stance.

"Even if I die, you shall not succeed." the Maximal said.  "Primus is 
stronger than you and your dark god, and does he not watch over his own 
children?  And are you not just a simple Predacon with far too much power and 
responsibility than even you can handle?"

"Bah," the Archbishop Vehement replied with a grin, his seven foot broadsword 
appearing his hands from subspace, "the Key, give it to me and I won't 
slaughter you."

"Your threats mean nothing.  If I die, I will be one with the Matrix, which 
was created by my god, Primus." Smokescreen took a step forward, the seven 
foot skunk-bot dwarfed by the sixteen foot tall Vehement.

"Then prepare to become one with the Void." Vehement laughed, his sensors 
detecting where the Key was immmediately.  "No chance in the Void you will 
stand up against me, though.  A pity too." he charged forward with speed one 
would not think a bot of his size would have and slashed his blade hard.

Smokescreen saw the large blade come and ducked under it, the broadsword big 
and slow, somewhat like Vehement.  Smokescreen's small size was a blessing 
now.  He charged forward, stabbing his blade forward, only to be blocked by 
Vehement's sword.

A push from the Archbishop sent Smokescreen stumbling back a few feet, the 
leader of the Brotherhood charged forward and sending a stab of his own at 
Smokescreen.
